abstract: Howard Beck On Basketball column notes that NBA players and owners took day for regrouping and reassessing after negotiations broke down with no further sessions scheduled.
snippet: Friday was a day for regrouping and reassessing after negotiations between N.B.A. players and owners broke down on Thursday with no further sessions scheduled.
lead_paragraph: Friday was a day for regrouping and reassessing after negotiations between N.B.A. players and owners broke down on Thursday with no further sessions scheduled.

headline.main: With Talks at a Halt, Silence Reigns
headline.print_headline: With Talks At a Halt, Silence Reigns
headline.seo: With N.B.A. Talks Halted, Sides Predict a Meeting Next Week
